languages.text: "Видит Император, все эти культисты мне поперек горла, но... мальчишка мог выстрелить в вас, Вольный Торговец, но не стал. Это как минимум повод разобраться в происходящем".
"Emperor knows I'm sick of all these cultists, and yet... The boy could have shot you, Rogue Trader, but he didn't. That is worth an investigation, at the very least."
languages.original_text: "Видит Император, все эти культисты мне поперек горла, но... мальчишка мог выстрелить в вас, Вольный Торговец, но не стал. Это как минимум повод разобраться в происходящем".

"Emperor knows I'm sick of all these cultists, and yet... The boy could have shot you, Rogue Trader, but he didn't. That is worth an investigation, at the very least."

languages.text: “帝皇在上，我真的很厌恶这些邪教徒，但话说回来……那个孩子本可以朝你开枪，行商浪人，但他并没有这么做，至少这点值得调查一下。”
languages.original_text: "Emperor knows I'm sick of all these cultists, and yet... The boy could have shot you, Rogue Trader, but he didn't. That is worth an investigation, at the very least."

traits.locale_text: “帝皇在上，我真的很厌恶这些邪教徒，但话说回来……那个孩子本可以朝你开枪，行商浪人，但他并没有这么做，至少这点值得调查一下。”

languages.text: «Sabe el Emperador que estoy hasta las narices de los cultistas, pero, no obstante... el muchacho podría haberle disparado, Comerciante, y no lo ha hecho. Eso merece una investigación, al menos».
languages.original_text: "Emperor knows I'm sick of all these cultists, and yet... The boy could have shot you, Rogue Trader, but he didn't. That is worth an investigation, at the very least."

traits.locale_text: «Sabe el Emperador que estoy hasta las narices de los cultistas, pero, no obstante... el muchacho podría haberle disparado, Comerciante, y no lo ha hecho. Eso merece una investigación, al menos».

languages.text: « L'Empereur sait à quel point je suis las de ces fanatiques, et pourtant... Ce garçon aurait pu vous tirer dessus, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, mais il ne l'a pas fait. Je pense que cela mérite au moins une enquête. »
languages.original_text: "Emperor knows I'm sick of all these cultists, and yet... The boy could have shot you, Rogue Trader, but he didn't. That is worth an investigation, at the very least."

traits.locale_text: « L'Empereur sait à quel point je suis las de ces fanatiques, et pourtant... Ce garçon aurait pu vous tirer dessus, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, mais il ne l'a pas fait. Je pense que cela mérite au moins une enquête. »

languages.text: 「皇帝のみぞ知ることですが、私はこんなカルト信者どもにはうんざりしています…ですが…ローグトレーダー、あの少年はあなたを撃つこともできたのです。なのに撃ちませんでした。それだけでも調査する価値はあります」
languages.original_text: "Emperor knows I'm sick of all these cultists, and yet... The boy could have shot you, Rogue Trader, but he didn't. That is worth an investigation, at the very least."

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝のみぞ知ることですが、私はこんなカルト信者どもにはうんざりしています…ですが…ローグトレーダー、あの少年はあなたを撃つこともできたのです。なのに撃ちませんでした。それだけでも調査する価値はあります」

languages.text: "İmparator şahidim olsun bu tarikatçılardan bıktım ama... Çocuk seni vurabilirdi Hür Tacir ama vurmadı. Bu, en azından araştırmaya değer."
languages.original_text: "Emperor knows I'm sick of all these cultists, and yet... The boy could have shot you, Rogue Trader, but he didn't. That is worth an investigation, at the very least."

traits.locale_text: "İmparator şahidim olsun bu tarikatçılardan bıktım ama... Çocuk seni vurabilirdi Hür Tacir ama vurmadı. Bu, en azından bir araştırmaya değer."

languages.text: "Beim Imperator, ich habe diese Kultisten so satt, und dennoch ... der Junge hätte Euch erschießen können, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, aber er hat es nicht getan. Das ist zumindest eine Untersuchung wert."
languages.original_text: "Emperor knows I'm sick of all these cultists, and yet... The boy could have shot you, Rogue Trader, but he didn't. That is worth an investigation, at the very least."

traits.locale_text: "Beim Imperator, ich habe diese Kultisten so satt, und dennoch ... der Junge hätte Euch erschießen können, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, aber er hat es nicht getan. Das ist zumindest eine Untersuchung wert."
